name: places/ChIJOeBW5b1ZwokR7eRwBTCzOa8
adrFormatAddress: 56 7th Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
I like the offering of freshly ground PB and almond butter and appreciate that they allow me to bring my own jar to refill so I don’t need to create waste.

I would really love to see some more bulk options though. Ideally, nuts and pasta in bulk, as well as refillable olive oil! I am committed to zero waste lifestyle and would love to see more package and plastic free options.

originalText.text: Incredible selection of healthy and organic foods, supplements and other products.  Friendly and helpful staff.  Very clean and smart interior

text.text: Incredible selection of healthy and organic foods, supplements and other products.  Friendly and helpful staff.  Very clean and smart interior

originalText.text:
I love this store for so many reasons. They specialize in rare finds such as mushroom coffee, plant based products, homeopathic remedies, and fun healthy snacks. So so so so sooooooo excited to have found a store with the largest selection of FourSigmatic mushrooms!

I met the owner who was so friendly. The store makes me happy to know it exists and run by someone who is informed and still curious for more. This is one of the bigger spaces I’ve been to and I’m quite happy to know they have such a large selection of products.

My favorite section is the ice cream section. They have the hard to find brands. They have dairy free options and plant based options. I think they can expand to more unique brands too but I’m quite happy living close to this store.

This is a great store for truly health conscious and health curious people. Catering to mainly vegans with options for their friends!

originalText.text: The female  pharmacist with the accent is really the ONLY reason I still go here! I caught an old pervertish looking guy literally on  his knees watching me through a hole in the wall from outside the actual pharmacy in the grocery side on two occasions. (The products on the pharmacy shelves need to be dusted with a towel they are so old and invaluable) he was desperate to associate his small mind and big stereotype to my assumed persona. Too bad he missed the little old lady that I saw drop the box of  premium tea bags in her pocket book? What an imbecile! Then on one occasion I’m in the clinic area waiting for the pharmacist to come back and complete my vaccination. All of a sudden some skinny looking Hispanic guy comes from the front of the store in a loud accusatory tone questioning what  am I doing in  the office. The one directly across from the POS counter in this tiny space that is only unlocked in a need to basis by pharmacy staff. Well I can see why he wasn’t so bright he was just emptying the trash cans. Which ls what he’s qualified to do and should stick to his expertise and not customer relations or loss prevention. I’m not even going to go in to detail about the delivery driver. Let’s just conclude with the fair statement if you look a certain way, I suppose you will be satisfied but everyone deserves to be treated with respect and dignity. They are overpriced have terrible customer service due to their ignorance. So why should people shop where people don’t appreciate their presence let alone their business? Please it’s a Duane Reade right across the street. Not much better but at least they are consistently suspicious and have things a Theif may attempt to steal however, I wouldn’t know from experience.
